text: Va ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo az Bani Isroil pajmon girift va az mijoni onon [ʙa te'dodi qaʙoilason] duvozdah solor ʙargumostem va Alloh taolo guft: "Man ʙo sumo hastam. Agar namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed va ʙa pajomʙaroni man imon ʙijovared va ononro giromi dored va dar rohi Alloh taolo vomi naku dihed, gunohonatonro mezudojam va sumoro ʙa ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] vorid mekunam, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast. Pas, har jak az sumo, ki ʙa'd az in kofir savad, musallaman, rohi rostro gum kardaast
